title: Legislative challenge in Russia and China

content.question: Which of the following describes a political challenge common to legislatures in both Russia and China?

choices.label: Both countries have legislatures that confirm either a prime minister or premier.
Both countries have legislatures that are solely in charge of developing foreign policy.
In both countries the executive branch appoints members to the upper house of the legislature.
Both countries have legislatures that are elected in single-member districts in first-past-the-post elections.

content.answer: Both countries have legislatures that confirm either a prime minister or premier.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
